msg.msgText: Destination mapping rule {0}. Queue manager connection {1}. Unable to define callback function for WebSphere MQ queue manager {2}. MQCB Reason {3}.

msgExplanation.p: MQ Connectivity was unable to define a callback function for the named queue manager and therefore cannot receive notification of queue manager state changes.

msgUserResponse.p: If the problem persists, contact IBM support for further assistance.
